summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 3.0°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.9°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%) and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 635 m) and rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1585 m), light levels (up 3178 lux), feels like temperature (up 4.9°C), and outside temperature (up 4.6°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 634.8m lower than yesterday, 546.7m lower than the past week, 1584.8m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 1059m and a high of 3380m, averaging 1089.5m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and little or no wind. Chance of light rain, occasional overcast conditions, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
